name: ai-skills-library
description: Comprehensive AI Skills Library — 75 expert skills across 6 domains: Enterprise, Code Development, AI Governance, Data & BI, Market Finance, Productivité. State-of-the-art best practices, bilingual FR/EN.

plugins.name: entreprise
plugins.description: 23 expert skills for enterprise operations: strategy, marketing, sales, finance, project management, HR, operations, IT/systems, procurement, client support, risk management, legal, communication, CSR/ESG, product strategy, user research, change management, innovation management, data privacy & compliance, leadership & management, fundraising & VC, pricing strategy, and entrepreneurship.

plugins.name: code-development
plugins.description: 19 expert skills for software development: architecture, code excellence, UI/UX, process engineering, auth & security, backend & databases, payment/Stripe, monitoring & observability, DevOps & CI/CD, product analytics, quality & reliability, AI engineering, API design, cloud infrastructure, mobile development, web performance, frontend frameworks (React/Next.js), security testing (OWASP/SAST/DAST), and web accessibility (WCAG/A11y).

plugins.name: ai-governance
plugins.description: 7 expert skills for AI maturity & governance: AI strategy, AI ethics & responsible AI, prompt engineering & LLMOps, AI risk assessment, AI implementation & MLOps, AI data privacy & EU AI Act compliance, and agentic AI systems.

plugins.name: data-bi
plugins.description: 11 expert skills for data & business intelligence: decision/reporting/governance, data engineering & pipelines, data literacy & storytelling, advanced analytics & ML, data quality & observability, streaming & real-time analytics, customer analytics, A/B testing & experimentation, time series forecasting, data visualization tools (Power BI/Tableau), and geospatial analytics.

plugins.name: finance-de-marche
plugins.description: 5 expert skills for market finance & investment: options & risk management, portfolio construction, behavioral finance, regulatory & compliance, and quantitative finance & algorithmic trading.

plugins.name: productivite
plugins.description: 10 expert skills for productivity and automation: spreadsheets (Excel/Sheets), presentations & storytelling, professional documents, workflow automation (N8N/Zapier/Make/Power Automate), no-code apps, knowledge management (Notion/Obsidian), digital collaboration, email & time management, AI copilots, and visual design tools (Figma/Canva).
